duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct wine & craft spirit tastings in retail establishments and special events.
Explain and promote the wines being showcased, helping demystify the products and making sales.
Work occasionally when events occur, requiring part-time flexible weekend hours.
Possess a background in the wine industry is preferred.

education_certification.credential: Basic understanding of wine and its influence on the world.
Outgoing, accountable, friendly, and polished in appearance.
Possession of cell phone, internet access, car, or other reliable transportation.
Background in the wine industry is preferred.
